snippet.title: Empires in Ruins - Early Access trailer
snippet.description:
Empires in Ruins is the story-driven bastard child of 4X and Tower Defense, set in a grim, corrupted world, and infused with low brow humour.

Wishlist on Steam: http://bit.ly/eir_steam

Hammer&Ravens official Discord server: http://discord.gg/eir

Official website: http://www.empiresinruins.com/

Empires in Ruins will release on Steam on the 4th of February 2020.

Design, development and video editing: Emiliano Pastorelli
3D Art: George Bigiakis, Alexandros Iakovidis, John Gkekis, Alessio De Luca
Illustration: Giulia Profeta
Music: Red Dew Hellpipes (Lino Pastorelli, Alberto Cantilena, Davide Frattarola, Simone Guerrucci)
Voice acting: Doug Cockle
